111311.content: Isabella Garcia-Shapiro is a young girl with an awesome lifestyle. She's the leader of her Fireside Girl's troop, gets to help out with Phineas and his daily summer projects, and is pretty much not afraid to take on any objective. However, there is a little secret that she doesn't let any know of: she likes to wear and use diapers. Well, she had only stuck to small baby diapers during her babysitting jobs because it was super difficult to find a diaper her size. It was pretty much the only excuse she had to get diapers worry-free. One day, however, Isabella found herself in a bit of a drought. There hadn't been any babysitting requests in weeks and she was losing it. One day she had enough and decided to just go out and get herself some diapers. Deciding to go to the pharmacy she searched around the diaper aisle where she managed to...

Since Isabella was desperate enough to have some kind of absorbent underwear to use, she decided not to wait another day or so for the pharmacy to restock and went straight for the bed-wetting products. When looking at the products, it didn't take Isabella long to find some l/xl good-nites to which she grabbed a pack and quickly paid for them so she could get home and not only try on her new "underwear", but also to make sure no one saw her with what she had.

1153112211221111.content:
Mabel is 12 years old, but unlike most 12 year olds, she does one thing that makes her unique. She wears and uses diapers.

It all started when she was little. She pretty much refused to potty trained. While Her Twin Brother, Mason or as everyone calls him Dipper, after his Birthmark of the Big Dipper on his Forehead, was a fast trainer and almost instantly got into underwear, Mabel would rather wear a diaper and pee and poo in it like a baby.

Eventually, she did get potty trained but she hated it, although she was known to wet the bed, her parents put her back into them at night hoping it doesn't last forever, but then she turned 7 and it kept getting worse until one day.

She confessed she was purposely wetting the bed just to stay in Diapers.

After a heart to heart discussion, they decided to put Mabel back in diapers full time.

She started with the largest sized Baby Diaper until she outgrew them, she was switched to a plain youth sized incontinence diaper, which she didn't like but her parents let her doodle on some to liven them up.

After she outgrew those they switched her to small sized adult diapers. They eventually found websites that makes adult diapers with Baby-Like Prints called ABUniverse and Rearz and bought her some diapers in her size and she loved them ever since.

Right now she is wakes up in her bed wearing a Floppy Disc Nightgown and underneath, a ______ diaper
1153112211221111.title: Entire family

info.description:
Pick whatever girl you want from either anime or from cartoons and get them padded. And be sure that their diapers get used, too. Your only limit is your imagination as well as a few other rules:

WARNING: This story uses elements relating to diapers, diaper usage, and even a little babying. If this isn't your interest then do not venture any further.

Rules:
-No adults getting diapered, only the kids and teens can be
-No sexual stuff
-No blood
-No gore
-No DEATHS!!!
-No Vore
-Have good grammer
-Keep posts lengthy. No short one-sentence posts over and over again.

I have the right to edit any chapter I deem unfit for the rules above. Any chapter that breaks the rules in any way can be edited or deleted without warning.
